project.description:
Android Nougat s5p4418 weekly build
매주 05:00 trigger <!-- Managed by Jenkins Job Builder -->

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
echo "*****************************************" echo " Jenkins - Android environment setup " echo "*****************************************"
export LC_ALL=en_US.UTF-8 export LANG=en_US.UTF-8 export LANGUAGE=en_US.UTF-8 export USER=nxJenkins
echo "*************************************" echo " Android nougat s5p4418 navi_ref " echo "*************************************" ./device/nexell/navi_ref/build.sh -d result-s5p4418-navi_ref

#!/bin/bash
echo "************************************" echo " clean old dirs " echo "************************************" rm -rf result-*-weekly rm -rf result-*-weekly.tar.gz
echo "************************************" echo " BUILD-INFO.txt copy to result dir " echo "************************************" cp ${JENKINS_HOME}/snapshot_build_info/BUILD-INFO.txt result-s5p4418-navi_ref/
echo "************************************" echo " Compress result dirs " echo "************************************" tar cvzf result-s5p4418-navi-ref-nougat.tar.gz result-s5p4418-navi_ref/*
echo "************************************" echo " For LAVA Test " echo "************************************" cp result-s5p4418-navi-ref-nougat.tar.gz result-s5p4418-navi-ref-nougat-for-lava-test.tar.gz
echo "************************************" echo " Rename tarballs " echo "************************************" mv result-s5p4418-navi-ref-nougat.tar.gz result-s5p4418-android-nougat-navi-ref-`date +%Y%m%d`-weekly.tar.gz
echo "************************************" echo " Rename result dirs " echo "************************************" mv result-s5p4418-navi_ref result-s5p4418-android-nougat-navi-ref-`date +%Y%m%d`-weekly
